column4: hello could somebody please  pm me about installing ubuntu, I get stuck at the partition part im not surewhat todo from there...Ive got a tutorial printed out but its not really that usefull and id rather not loose my data
...somebody , Id rather not google it cause then I cant ask quick questions
hey, there is an optino in the installer to automatically resize your existing partitions
it means you don't have to do anything manually
